import React, { Suspense, lazy } from "react"; import styles from './Heade.module.scss' import oggetto from './oggetto.png' import chat from './chat.png' import calendar from './calendar.png' import workers from './workers.png' import loop from './search.png' import notification from './notification.png' import { Route, defer, useLoaderData } from 'react-router-dom' const FirstPage = lazy(() => import('../FirstPage')) const Header = ({pic_src}) => { const {comment} = useLoaderData() console.log(comment) return(

чаты

каналы

) } const getComment = async () => { const resp = await fetch('https://jsonplaceholder.typicode.com/posts/1') if(!resp.ok) { throw new Response('', {status: 404, statusText: 'Not found'}) } return resp.json() } const HeaderLoader = () => { return defer({ comment: getComment() }) } export {Header, HeaderLoader}
